title: Scattering of the Vlasov-Riesz system in the three dimensions
abstract:
We consider an asymptotic behavior of solutions to the Vlasov-Riesz system of
order $\alpha$ in $\mathbb{R}^3$ which is a kinetic model induced by Riesz
interactions. We prove small data scattering when $1/2<\alpha<1$ and modified
scattering when $1<\alpha<1+\delta$ for some $\delta>0$. Moreover, we show the
existence of (modified) wave operators for such a regime. To the best of our
knowledge, this is the first result on the existence of modified scattering
with polynomial correction in kinetic models.
